attributes.action: Call for a national emergency. End the small boat crossings.
attributes.background: We feel the British public are not being listened to, the government urgently need to get a grip on the ongoing small boat crossings in the English Channel. We feel now is the time to call for a national emergency.

rejection.details: It is not clear what you mean in regards to declaring a national emergency and what sort of impact you would like this to have.
